-spec number_of_ways(S :: unicode:unicode_binary(), T :: unicode:unicode_binary(), K :: integer()) -> integer().
number_of_ways(S, T, K) ->
    Mod = 1000000007,
    N = byte_size(S),
    S1 = binary_to_list(S),
    T1 = binary_to_list(T),
    Equal = if S == T -> 1; true -> 0 end,
    rotate_count(S1, T1, N, 0, Equal, Mod, K).

rotate_count(_, _, N, Count, Equal, Mod, K) when Count >= N ->
    case K rem 2 of
        0 -> (pow(2, K, Mod) - 2 + Equal) rem Mod;
        1 -> 0
    end;
rotate_count(S, T, N, Count, Equal, Mod, K) ->
    NewS = rotate(S, N, Count + 1),
    NewEqual = if NewS == T -> 1; true -> 0 end,
    rotate_count(S, T, N, Count + 1, Equal + NewEqual, Mod, K).

rotate(List, N, Count) ->
    {Left, Right} = lists:split(N - Count, List),
    Right ++ Left.

pow(_, 0, _) -> 1;
pow(Base, Exp, Mod) when Exp rem 2 == 0 ->
    Half = pow(Base, Exp div 2, Mod),
    (Half * Half) rem Mod;
pow(Base, Exp, Mod) ->
    (Base * pow(Base, Exp - 1, Mod)) rem Mod.
